Title: Dev.D
Writer: Saratchandra Chatterjee (novel), Abhay Deol (concept), Vikramaditya Motwane, Anurag Kashyap
Actors: Abhay Deol, Mahie Gill, Kalki Koechlin, Dibyendu Bhattacharya
Plot: After breaking up with his childhood sweetheart, a young man finds solace in drugs. Meanwhile, a teenage girl is caught in the world of prostitution. Will they be destroyed, or will they find redemption?
